name: DeliveRoot
description:
Winner of the Turin Game Jam 2023 (GGJ 2023)!

---

Do you want to order some delicious food to satisfy your hunger? We can provide you with anything you need. 

Don't mind the giant sentient delivery root-man, though. 

*DeliveRoot won't refund any damaged goods orders or windows broken during the service. 

Deliver food to hungry customers in this fast paced puzzle game in which you will be impersonating a giant, sentient and ever-growing delivery root-man. 

Navigate the level quickly and think carefully, because wrong moves such as entangling or hitting deadly obstacles could make you stop growing. Keep going and deliver your orders on time! 

Featuring: 

  • A giant sentient root-man who works for a food delivery business 
  • Fast paced puzzle solving 
  • Lots of juice 
  • Smooth, satisfactory action 
  • Colorful artstyle 

Move with WASD or directional arrows, deliver the orders, don't get hurt and don't waste any time! 

You can restart the level anytime by pressing R.

Credits:

  • Ettore Palma
  • Fabio Mellone
  • Irene "Amaryllis" Cancellara
